sakai:shortDescription: Get bookmarks from the Delicious JSON feed.
sakai:title: Delicious GET bookmarks
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "mode", "description" : "The correct mode of which the bookmarks should be obtained. This is a part of the proxy endpoint and contains a username whenever needed (modes: personal, network, subscriptions)."}
{"name" : "count", "description" : "The number of bookmarks to fetch. This is a part of the proxy endpoint."}
sakai:description: This proxy will retrieve bookmarks from a remote Delicious JSON feed.
sakai:response: Sends an HTTP request in order to receive a JSON feed containing the bookmarks from the desired category.
